properties.areaDesc: Transylvania; Northern Jackson; Greenville Mountains; Pickens Mountains; Southern Jackson; Greater Greenville
properties.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued February 9 at 4:54AM EST until February 9 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg SC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in freezing fog.

* WHERE...In South Carolina, Pickens Mountains and Greenville
County. In North Carolina, Jackson and Transylvania Counties.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions will arise due to low
visibility in dense, freezing fog and the potential for a light
glaze of ice to develop on bridges.
properties.instruction:
If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights and fog
lamps, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert
for icing on bridge decks causing slippery road surfaces.

NWSheadline: FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING
